title: Trump Settles With Protesters Who Said His Bodyguards Attacked Them
description: One of the demonstrators said a bodyguard struck him on the head outside Trump Tower in 2015. Terms of the deal were not released.
dc:creator: Jonah E. Bromwich

media:content.media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Donald Trump said he knew little of the fracas, but that his bodyguard had torn up “a 50-cent sign.”
